maxairesources.pipeline.pipeline_factory module

class maxairesources.pipeline.pipeline_factory.SparkTransformerFactory[source]

Bases: object

A Factory class to register all supported transformers/estimators in Spark

get_transformer(transformer, kwargs=None)[source]

Gets a transformer/estimator from registry Arguments: transformer (string) : name of transformer/estimator to be added to Pipeline Returns: Transformer/Estimator Object

register_transformer()[source]

Function to register a transformer/estimator

maxairesources.pipeline.spark_pipeline module

class maxairesources.pipeline.spark_pipeline.SparkPipeline(stages)[source]

Bases: object

Creates a Spark Pipeline consiting of Transformers and Estimators, calling fit on pipeline will execute the stages in order

build()[source]

Method to creates Spark Pipeline Returns: A Spark Pipeline Object

build_multiple()[source]

Method to creates Spark Pipeline for multiple columns with same transformers Returns: A Spark Pipeline Object

fit(data)[source]

Fits pipeline on Spark dataframe Argument data : A spark dataframe on which pipeline object is fit Returns None

fit_multiple(data)[source]

Fits pipeline on Spark dataframe Argument data : A spark dataframe on which pipeline object is fit Returns None

save(path, mode='spark')[source]

Save pipeline Argument path : file path where fit pipeline object is stored

training_framework = 'spark'
transform(data)[source]

Transforms Spark dataframe using pipeline Argument data : A Spark dataframe to be transformed using an existing pipeline Returns spark dataframe
